ygData.subject: Re: Loosing exp when dying
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t personally seen this, but it would account for the widely varied reports of how much exp. is lost at each level. Munk ... From: scott@speechworks.com
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't personally seen this, but it would account for the widely varied reports of how much exp. is lost at each level.

Munk

-----Original Message-----
From: scott@... [mailto:scott@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 10:15 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dying


From: scott@...

I saw someone write somewhere that the exp you loose depends on the monster that kills you. Such as if you die from a monster that is many levels below you, you loose more exp. Is this true?

Azboklin the enchanter
